casebody.data:
MEYER v. JOHNSTON. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. December 30, 1908.) Appeal from Special Term, Queens County. Action by Robert L. Meyer against Lewis Johnston. Judgment for defendant, and plaintiff appeals. Affirmed.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, JENKS, HOOKER, GAYNOR, RICH, and MILLER, JJ.

Charles J. Gerlich, for appellant. Thomas E. Keogh (Lewis Johnson, on the brief), for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Suns-wick Land Company v. Murdock (decided herewith) 114 N. Y. Supp. 436.
